AbstractDAO<T> - Class in dao
The class AbstractDAO creates general queries on the database: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE
AbstractDAO() - Constructor for class dao.AbstractDAO
This method represents the constructor of the AbstractDAO class and gets the name of the provided class T
addClientButton() - Method in class presentation.ClientDesign
This method adds the introduced client in the database
addNewClient(ActionEvent) - Method in class presentation.ClientDesign
This method sets the window of "Add client" in the UI
addNewOrder(ActionEvent) - Method in class presentation.OrderDesign
This method sets the window of "Add order" in the UI
addProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class presentation.ProductDesign
This method sets the window of "Add product" in the UI
addProductButton() - Method in class presentation.ProductDesign
This method adds the introduced product in the database
Alert - Class in presentation
The class Alert generates different alerts for errors occurring in introducing the input in the UI
Alert() - Constructor for class presentation.Alert
 
alertBillSuccessfull() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user the bill of the order was successfully created
alertBillUnsuccessfull() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user the generation of the order's bill failed
alertClientNotFound() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user that a client was not found in the database
alertDeleteSuccessful() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about a successful delete query
alertEditSuccessful() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about a successful update query
alertErrorDelete() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about a failed delete query
alertErrorEdit() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about a failed update query
alertErrorInsert() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about a failed insert query
alertInsertSuccessful() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about a successful insert query
alertInvalidEmail() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about an invalid email introduced
alertInvalidID() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about an invalid ID introduced
alertInvalidInput() - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user about an invalid input
alertInvalidQuantity(String) - Method in class presentation.Alert
This method is used to create an alert which informs the user that the introduced quantity is invalid
